data.title: Beyoncé Knowles
data.meta_description: #45 Beyoncé Knowles on the 2024 America's Self-Made Women - The majority of pop star Beyoncé Knowles' net worth comes from her roughly three decades as
data.text:
Beyoncé Hits The Top 10 On Five Charts Simultaneously

Beyonce's Cowboy Carter soars back into the top 10 on five different Billboard charts after the deluxe edition was released on vinyl, spurring a sales surge.

Beyoncé’s Latest Album Is Up More Than 3,500% In Sales–But Why?

Beyonce's Cowboy Carter’s vinyl purchases increased by a little over 3,550% in just a single tracking frame.

Beyoncé Gallops Back Into The Top 10

Beyoncé’s latest album Cowboy Carter shoots from No. 50 to No. 10 on the Billboard 200 after its deluxe edition was released on vinyl.

Beyoncé And Taylor Swift Are Bound To Compete Against Each Other For The Grammys’ Top Prize—Again

Beyoncé And Taylor Swift have only competed against one another once for the Album of the Year Grammy, but they probably will again in 2025.

Megan Thee Stallion Shares The Business Advice She Got From Beyoncé

Megan Thee Stallion and Beyoncé have a very special friendship, and the latter star has even helped the rapper become a mogul.

How The Beyoncé Strategy Is Redefining Media Relationships

Explore the shift in luxury brand strategies with the 'Beyoncé strategy,' bypassing the press for direct consumer engagement. Learn how PR has evolved to meet new trends.

Beyoncé’s ‘Cowboy Carter’ Is Up Nearly 100% In Sales

Beyonce's new album Cowboy Carter returns to several charts following its re-release on vinyl, which spurred a huge gain in sales.

Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson Was Gifted Tickets To Beyoncé

A Supreme Court spokesperson confirmed the gift to The Washington Post and said: “Justice Jackson is Crazy in Love with Beyonce’s music. Who isn’t?”

Who Runs The World? Taylor Swift And Beyoncé Are Now Worth $2 Billion Combined

From tours to Instagram followers to number of platinum albums, here’s how these self-made pop icons are breaking records and getting richer.

How To Get Beyoncé Tickets In 2024

It’s been less than a year since her last tour, but Beyoncé may tour soon for her "Cowboy Carter" album. Here's everything we know about how to get Beyoncé tickets.

Morgan Wallen Matches Beyoncé With His Latest Smash Single

Morgan Wallen and Post Malone tie Beyonce as “I Had Some Help” rules both the Hot 100 and Hot Country Songs charts at the same time.

Beyoncé Scores Another Top 40 Smash With ‘II Hands II Heaven’

The track from Beyoncé's latest album debuts on the TikTok Billboard Top 50 chart this week, becoming the singer's fifth career top 40 win on the tally.

Miley Cyrus And Beyoncé’s New Single Could Be Saved By Radio

Miley Cyrus and Beyonce's "II Most Wanted" is slipping on some charts, such as the Hot 100, but simultaneously rising on others—especially radio-focused ones.

Beyoncé’s Guide To Legacy: 3 Steps To Make Your Mark

Beyonce's career is more than a tapestry of groundbreaking music and performances; it's a masterclass in cultivating a heritage that transcends generations.

Miley Cyrus And Beyoncé Are Just Getting Started

Beyoncé and Miley Cyrus' "II Most Wanted" debuts at No. 31 on Billboard's Pop Airplay chart, officially reaching a radio ranking for the first time.
